    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WSNotificationServer getInstance()
        Factory method providing an instance of WSNotificationServer, adhering to the singleton pattern. (Using default port from config file.)

      • getInstance

        public static WSNotificationServer getInstance(java.lang.Integer port)
        Factory method providing an instance of WSNotificationServer, adhering to the singleton pattern. (Using default port from config file.

        Note: This factory method will ignore the port argument if an instance is already running. In that case, one must stop the WSNServer instance and invoke it again to specify a different port.

        Parameters:
        port: - An integer representing the port WSNServer should bind to.

      • init

        protected void init(java.lang.Integer port)
        Initialization method that reads the wsnserver.xml configuration file and constructs a jetty server instance.
        Specified by:
        init in class AbstractProtocolServer
        Parameters:
        port: - An integer representing the port WSNServer should bind to.

      • boot

        public void boot()
        The primary boot method for starting a WSNServer instance. Will only perform actions if the server instance is not already running.

        Initializes a HttpClient, and starts it. Also adds predefined connectors to the jetty server instance. Constructs a new serverThread and starts the jetty server instance in this new thread.
